effects.tier3: 23 poison damage; M<5 the target is implanted

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: An implanted target has a soulraker handmaiden parasite gestating in them (see the handmaiden's Implanted Parasite trait).

items.name: Forced Gestation
items.target: Each implanted handmaiden parasite in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The hivequeen lets loose a subsonic call to each target, forcing them to immediately emerge from their host's body as a mature soulraker handmaiden and make a free strike.

items.name: For the Queen!
items.trigger: The hivequeen is targeted by a strike for the second time on an attacker's turn, whether by the attacker or another creature acting on the attacker's turn.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Two soulraker minions appear within distance.
A soulraker praetorian also appears within distance.
At the end of their turn, the hivequeen can consume an adjacent soulraker demon to end one effect on them that can be ended by a saving throw (no action required).
Any creature within 2 squares of a soulraker demon within 100 miles of the hivequeen can't be hidden from the hivequeen. The hivequeen has line of effect to such creatures.

items.name: Kicking the Nest
items.target: Each soulraker minion in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target can move their speed and make a free strike. If no minions are present, four soulraker minions are summoned into unoccupied spaces within distance before the hivequeen uses this villain action.

effects.tier3: 11 sonic damage; push 3; I<5 dazed (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The hivequeen shifts up to her speed.
